advices.advice: Remain attentive to your partner; you now need to be together than ever before
By now, packing for the maternity home should be complete
Walk outside, get some fresh air
Getting out of bed may at times pose a challenge, donâ€™t make sudden movements, but lie on your side and gradually get up
Childbirth classes divulge crucial information, and attendance with your partner can prove priceless
